name: Obsession-Worthy Peanut Butter Cookie Ice Cream
description: This is my favourite kind of summer indulgence! My reader-favourite Flourless Peanut Butter Cookies meet my dreamy homemade peanut butter and coconut milk ice cream in this cooling summer treat. Chewy coconut, snappy chocolate chips, and tender bites of soft peanut butter cookies blend perfectly with a creamy vanilla and peanut butter vegan ice cream. If I’d known how simple it was to make my own vegan ice cream (only 5 ingredients!), I would’ve invested in an ice cream machine long ago. Well, I’m making up for lost time now! The peanut butter ice cream is inspired by Cookie + Kate.
recipeIngredient: 1 batch Flourless Peanut Butter Cookies, divided
3 tablespoons (45 mL) smooth natural peanut butter
1/4 + 1/8 teaspoon fine sea salt, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Chill the ice cream bowl in the freezer overnight, or for at least 12 hours. This step is very important to ensure the ice cream thickens properly.
